tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.customName: App Startup Time by App & User
tiles.query: SELECT usersession.userId, useraction.name as Application, PERCENTILE(useraction.duration, 50) as MedianResponseTime  from useraction WHERE useraction.name LIKE "Client Startup%" GROUP BY usersession.userId, usersession.userExperienceScore, Application ORDER BY MedianResponseTime DESC LIMIT 1000

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT usersession.userId, PERCENTILE(useraction.duration, 50) as MedianResponseTime  from useraction WHERE useraction.name LIKE "ICA Latency Measurement" GROUP BY usersession.userId, usersession.userExperienceScore, Application ORDER BY MedianResponseTime DESC LIMIT 1000

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT usersession.userId, PERCENTILE(useraction.duration, 50) as MedianResponseTime  from useraction WHERE useraction.name LIKE "Network Latency Measurement" GROUP BY usersession.userId, usersession.userExperienceScore, Application ORDER BY MedianResponseTime DESC LIMIT 1000
